data.text: @j_g_allen I love this, yet Alabama didn’t even use the funds they received for COVID to make any changes to help ease the pandemic. How do we move Governor’s to hear this as a urgent priority?
@jklmd123 @j_g_allen That's my fear, or some obscure set of minor tax breaks that can't possibly offset the changes needed
@j_g_allen This should have been done after the Legionnaires debacle. Interior air is more polluted thanexterior
@j_g_allen Any clues yet as to how this will be implemented?
